channel.title: ganib on dronesec
channel.description: Recent content in ganib on dronesec

item.title: ganib project management 2.3 SQLi
item.description: Ganib is a project management tool supporting all the glorious project management utilities. The latest version, 2.3 and below, is vulnerable to multiple SQL injection vectors. The first SQL injection vector is a post-auth UPDATE injection in changetheme.jsp: String theme = request.getParameter("theme"); User user = (User) pageContext.getAttribute("user", PageContext.SESSION_SCOPE); if( user != null && user.getID() != null ) { DBBean db = new DBBean(); try { String query = "UPDATE PN_PERSON SET THEME_ID = '" + theme + "' WHERE PERSON_ID = " + user.
